meanings.sent1: The jalapic flavor of the dish reminded me of spicy peppers.
meanings.sent2: Her jalapic knowledge of herbal remedies impressed the group.
meanings.sent3: The jalapic aroma in the air made everyone sneeze uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The jalapic colors of the painting added a fiery intensity to the room.
meanings.sent5: The jalapic taste lingered on my tongue long after the meal was finished.

meanings.definition: Resembling jalap in taste or effect
meanings.sent1: The medicine had a jalapic aftertaste that made me grimace.
meanings.sent2: The jalapic heat of the salsa was too much for my taste buds.
meanings.sent3: His jalapic jokes always left us laughing until our sides hurt.
meanings.sent4: The jalapic kick of the drink woke me up better than coffee.
meanings.sent5: The jalapic spiciness of the curry made my eyes water with each bite.
